name: The-F
description:
The F (Try Hardcore Ending Farming)
-----------------------------------


You are a farmer but zombies will attack you, so your only defense is to buy turrets to protect your farm.

Tutorial quickly explain the buttons.
Shortcuts are customizable in Settings.

F2 : To take a screenshot
F3 : To see the debug info

Windows French Version : https://github.com/Atmog/The-F/releases/download/v1.0.0/TheF-fr.zip
